name: Jenny Lake Campground
description: A beautiful lakeside campground inside Grand Teton National Park with access to views, trails, and wildlife.

name: Lodgepole Campground
description: One of the largest campgrounds in Sequoia National Park, surrounded by giant sequoias.

name: Mather Campground
description: A popular campground on the South Rim of the Grand Canyon.

name: Maquoketa Caves Campground
description: A unique campground near caves and hiking trails in Maquoketa Caves State Park.

name: Cades Cove Campground
description: Located in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, known for wildlife and scenic loops.
